aether.pro_tips.line.aether.golden_oak_a: Amberoot trees yield valuable Golden Amber in their logs.
lore.block.aether.golden_oak_leaves: These golden Leaves generate with Amberoot trees. They spawn golden particles in a radius of 5 blocks. They yield Amberoot Saplings when decayed.
lore.block.aether.golden_oak_sapling: These large saplings when planted will grow into huge Amberoot trees! You can use Bone Meal to speed up the process.
lore.item.aether.golden_amber: These round golden orbs can be obtained by mining Amberoot Logs with a Gravitite Axe. Their main purpose is to craft Golden Darts, and Dart Shooters.
lore.item.aether.gravitite_axe: Part of Aether's best tool tier, this Axe not only can make wood blocks float, but it can mine Amberoot logs for Golden Amber!
